titleStmt.title: Mr. L'Estrange refuted with his own arguments being a reply to his late impertinent pamphlet entituled L'Estrange no papist : in farther justification of the informations sworn against him, before the lords of the secret committee / by J.P., Gent. ...
titleStmt.author: J. P., Gent.

notesStmt.note: Filmed copy has imprint date altered to 1684.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
